src_text: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.

hyp_text: Anak-anak nan indak ditarimo jo ati jo akal, disabuik "feral" atau liar. Sabagai feral anak-anak indak ditarimo jo ati jo akal alah jo orang (biasanyo katurunan) nan indak mambarokan anak-anak tu; dalam kasus lain, anak-anak tu diabaikan dek orang tuanyo karano alah indak dapek manarimo anak-anak tu karano alah indak dapek mambarokan ati jo akal anak-anak tu nan indak alah dapek.
